issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.instagram.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

To reproduce: Turn on the video player audio and pay attention to the audio, between posts like in the video. Missed ads (Audio) or incorrect blocking (Posts)

<details><summary>Video</summary>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/56846906/7fb9095f-2a79-4461-971e-a8756e723545

</details>

comment.body:
@zloyden It is caused by the Tracking Protection filter. When I disable that filter, the page works just fine.

On top of that, I've figured out the error `Uncaught (in promise): [object Undefined]` is shown in console right after the page loads, no need to submit anything.

comment.body:
@tdiken Ok.
Could you please test these rules?
```
proquest.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-read', 'GlobalSnowplowNamespace')
proquest.com#%#//scriptlet('abort-on-property-read', 'snowplow')
```



> I was able to get it working by adding the user rule `@@||proquest.com/modules.gz/snowplow/$domain=proquest.com` which allows `snowplow-app.js` and `snowplow-utils.js` and `snowplow-init.js`. It looks like those were the issue under the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter.

Please copy full URLs.

comment.body:
In mobile mode, the rule `insertlive.com###parallaxindetail_blank + div[style="padding-top:16px;margin-bottom:24px;"]` does not work.

<details>
  <summary>Screenshot</summary>
  
  ![noname-crop](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/1314456/a4a3eec9-4c5e-4855-ba9c-5beca68b9fa0)
</details>

Is this rule possible and safe?

`insertlive.com##article > .detail_text > div[style^="padding-top:16px;margin-bottom:24px;"]`

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://my.mail.ru/mail/woock/music](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmy.mail.ru%2Fmail%2Fwoock%2Fmusic) ### Comment > В Моём мире в разделе музыка постоянно появляется всплывающее окно с просьбой отключить Вашу защиту. Проблема возникла после того как я пытался решить другую проблему в Моём мире: полная блокировка звука на всём видео сайта. Я обращался за помощью в службу поддержки моего Яндекс браузера и следовал их инструкциям: загрузить гугл хром браузер, добавить новый профиль. Проблему так и не решили: надо разбираться с расширениями. Второй браузер и и новый профиль я удалил, они мешают и создают путаницу. После этих манипуляций и возникла проблема в разделе Музыка, хотя там до этого было всё хорошо. ### Screenshots

issue.title: Google Play: ru.sbcs.store

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ru.sbcs.store](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dru.sbcs.store) ### Comment Username: @Kitt703 > Здравствуйте. Пару дней назад на телефоне интернет стал не интернет при включенном блокировщике. Например, приложение самокат не загружается вовсе. Браузеры работают очень медленно и не програжают страницы полностью. Даже чтобы написать этот баг-репорт пришлось отключит защиту. Для теста я отключал поочередно все фильтры, на текущий момент выключены в настройках все фильтры, но при включении защиты все-равно проблемы. Пробовал и с домашнего wi fi, и с мобильной сетью. Но успеха не добился. Замечу, что в помощнике Adguard при запуске самоката не блокируется ничего. Да и в статистике тоже 0. Можете, пожалуйста, натолкнуть, куда копать. > Из последних действий - прочитал статью про куки в телеге и включил фильтр уведомлений, но для теста сейчас его также выключил. > > Кстати, при автоматическом заполнении данных в баг-репорте версия Android заполнилась "30" - обратите внимание. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6fh083w9zowswcssgswokksk4k04sg03jgdh64rhhg.jpg?nc=1)

Не повторяется. Попробуйте сбросить настройки в приложении Адгарда или переустановить его, а затем проверьте приложение самоката.

> Браузеры работают очень медленно и не програжают страницы полностью
на текущий момент выключены в настройках все фильтры

Если такое поведение стабильно повторяется, сообщите об этом [сюда](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues/new?assignees=&labels=Bug&projects=&template=Bug_report.yml).

issue.title: Modescanlator.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modescanlator.com/eternal-first-son-in-law/299/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard French filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

With french adguard filter in UblockOrigin, half of the images doesnt load. When i disable uBO all images are loading.

The cultprit seems to be this filter, with the rule 

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/10671518/6457e98c-0020-43c0-beec-48c0315dce44)

If i write a rule to counteract this one, everything works properly.

```@@||modescanlator.com/ads_block.txt$xhr,1p```





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Modescanlator.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

none

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modescanlator.com/eternal-first-son-in-law/299/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard French filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

With french adguard filter in UblockOrigin, half of the images doesnt load. When i disable uBO all images are loading.

The cultprit seems to be this filter, with the rule 

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/10671518/6457e98c-0020-43c0-beec-48c0315dce44)

If i write a rule to counteract this one, everything works properly.

```@@||modescanlator.com/ads_block.txt$xhr,1p```





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/161879#issuecomment-1733756535 first, you have a typo in the rule. Do the following:
1. Remove your rule
2. Add this rule `bilibili.com##.feed2` to user rules
3. Wait in the app ~ one minute. This step is important, do not skip it. Otherwise the rule won't apply in Safari
4. Open the site in Safari.

In case you still have this on your end, please report about it [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardForSafari/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&projects=&template=issue_template.yaml).

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.temu.com/de](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.temu.com%2Fde) ### Comment > It would be nice if you could fix the bugs in AdGuard for Safari. When I browse my filters are not always working. I have 2 Mac Books, 1 iPhone and an iPad and a Mac Studio with different Apple IDs and I have the same problems on all devices. All filters are updated every hour and the software is always on the latest version. I saw that someone already reported this page on GitHub, but it can't be reproduced. issue.title: test.mm.pl
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://test.mm.pl/index-fp.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftest.mm.pl%2Findex-fp.html) ### Comment > Zauważyłem, że zaczyna jakby przycinać internet na większości stronek. Sprawdziłem szybkość internetu na stronie swojego operatora Multimedia i wyniki okazały się dziwne. Myślałem, że coś jest nie tak z internetem a tu się okazało, że jak wyłączyłem adblokera Adguard, internet nagle odżył co widać po odczytach na screenach. Co ciekawsze, nie przycina całego internetu ale co niektóre strony albo podstrony. Test zrobiony na innej stronie: https://www.speedtest.pl pokazał także różnicę w testach, szczególnie przy wysyłaniu pakietu. O dziwo ping był już prawidłowy. ### Screenshots
